actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase an authorization of appropriations in order to complete the Mission 66 Bypass Road at Vicksburg, Miss.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations in order to complete the Mission 66 Bypass Road at Vicksburg, Mississippi, from $2,050,000 to $3,550,000. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 430b-5)

titles.title: A bill to increase an authorization of appropriations in order to complete the Mission 66 Bypass Road at Vicksburg, Miss.
